P4_Advanced_Commodities.name: Broadcast Node
P4_Advanced_Commodities.ultimate_use: Used for Upwell structure construction (e.g. Citadels) and sovereignty infrastructure upgrades; also in certain capital ship modules.

P4_Advanced_Commodities.name: Integrity Response Drones
P4_Advanced_Commodities.ultimate_use: Used for Upwell structures and Sov upgrades (e.g. Infrastructure Hubs); also in some capital ship modules.

P4_Advanced_Commodities.name: Nano-Factory
P4_Advanced_Commodities.ultimate_use: Used for structures/sov upgrades and in some advanced implant manufacturing (e.g. Nirvana, Hydra implant sets).

P4_Advanced_Commodities.name: Organic Mortar Applicators
P4_Advanced_Commodities.ultimate_use: Used for structures and deployable structures (e.g. Mobile Backup Units).

P4_Advanced_Commodities.name: Recursive Computing Module
P4_Advanced_Commodities.ultimate_use: Used for structures/sov upgrades and high-end capital ship components.

P4_Advanced_Commodities.name: Self-Harmonizing Power Core
P4_Advanced_Commodities.ultimate_use: Used for structures/sov upgrades and some capital modules (e.g. Doomsday devices).

P4_Advanced_Commodities.name: Sterile Conduits
P4_Advanced_Commodities.ultimate_use: Used for structures/sov upgrades and capital ship construction (structure components).

P4_Advanced_Commodities.name: Wetware Mainframe
P4_Advanced_Commodities.ultimate_use: Used for structures/sov upgrades, capital modules, and some mobile structures (e.g. Cyno Beacon).
